title: The war of corrosive ideologies: James Hohmann, Julia Ioffe and David Brody
description: As the House Judiciary holds its first impeachment hearing, partisanship takes center stage. Meanwhile, the 2020 Democrats have lost a few players. How will the latest billionaire wildcard shake up the race?
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
